name: gamevault
description: GameVault is a self-hosted gaming launcher and library manager. It scans games, provides metadata, launch buttons, and remote play support. Supports Windows and Linux builds, with a slick UI for organizing your collection.
features: Game Library Management: Organize and catalog your game collection with automatic metadata and artwork retrieval.
Remote Launcher: Launch games remotely from any device with cross-platform Windows and Linux support.
Metadata Enrichment: Automatically fetch game details, cover art, and descriptions for your library.
Remote Play: Stream and play games from your server with built-in remote play capabilities.
Cross-Platform Support: Deploy on Windows or Linux with native builds for both operating systems.
Collection Browser: Browse your game library through a polished, modern web interface.
Automatic Scanning: Detect and index games from configured directories with minimal manual input.
Personal Gaming Hub: Centralize your gaming collection in a self-hosted platform with full control.
